statements: DELETE FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 123 AND login_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM activity_log WHERE logout_timestamp IS NULL OR player_id = 456;
DELETE FROM player_activity_log WHERE player_id = 100 AND login_timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM logout WHERE player_id = 3 AND logout_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM activity_log WHERE player_id = 123 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM login WHERE player_id IN (SELECT id FROM player WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM player_logs WHERE player_id = 500 AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
